page.title: 06Children's Games
page.content: One of the most popular children's games is skipping.Two girls hold the end of the rope while any amount of girls queue up to skip.There are a variety of rhymes to sing while skipping. There is also French skipping. Two girls who are end stand opposite each other with a piece of thick elastic around the backs of their legs while the skippers jump over the elastic from side to side reciting the rhyme.A game which most boys play is marbles.Each boy has a separate amount.One of them throws a marble,which both then try to hit.The winner throws a marble and the whole activity is repeated.Another game is Bulldog.One boy is "on" while all the other boys line up and one boy is elected to run a certain distance not being caught.If he succeeds all the other boys do the same.
